name: d3-hcg
description: The HCG (Hue, Chroma, Grayness) color space.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-color:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-hcg.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-hcg.js -c -m -o build/d3-hcg.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-hcg.js ../d3.github.com/d3-hcg.v0.0.js && cp build/d3-hcg.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-hcg.v0.0.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-hcg.v0.0.js d3-hcg.v0.0.min.js && git commit -m "d3-hcg ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-hcg.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-hcg.js build/d3-hcg.min.js
